radiographic_examinations.findings: Numerous lytic lesions in the thoracic spine and pathologic compression fractures of T5 and T7.

radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: Magnetic Resonance Imaging (MRI) of the lumbar spine
radiographic_examinations.findings: Numerous lesions with high signal intensity involving the vertebral bodies and posterior elements.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Increase in the size and number of lesions with high signal intensity, including a new pathologic compression fracture of L1, observed 2 months after initial diagnosis.

radiographic_examinations.findings: FDG-avid lesions throughout the axial and appendicular skeleton.
